snippet: In his new book, Stephen R. Platt recounts the 19th-century Taiping conflict in China, perhaps the bloodiest civil war of all time.
abstract: Dwight Garner reviews book Autumn in the Heavenly Kingdom: China, the West, and the Epic Story of the Taiping Civil War by Stephen R Platt.
lead_paragraph: In his new book, Stephen R. Platt recounts the 19th-century Taiping conflict in China, perhaps the bloodiest civil war of all time.

headline.seo: ‘Autumn in the Heavenly Kingdom’ by Stephen R. Platt
headline.main: A Chinese Civil War to Dwarf All Others
headline.print_headline: A Chinese Civil War to Dwarf All Others
